column2: "Welcome back, <%me>. So you don't think you've been getting a bit too cocky lately?"
"But since there are also those that end up croaking after saying that and losing focus, shouldn't you be careful?"
"But seeing how you did this time, I guess you're probably going to be okay."
"In any case, you're back safe and sound, and that's what matters most. Hope to see you around, <%me>."
